parameters.label: organization-defined critical information system software and other security-related information

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: The organization stores backup copies of {{ cp-9.3_prm_1 }} in a separate facility or in a fire-rated container that is not collocated with the operational system

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Critical information system software includes, for example, operating systems, cryptographic key management systems, and intrusion detection/prevention systems. Security-related information includes, for example, organizational inventories of hardware, software, and firmware components. Alternate storage sites typically serve as separate storage facilities for organizations

parts.name: objective
parts.prose: defines critical information system software and other security-related information requiring backup copies to be stored in a separate facility; o

parts.name: objective
parts.prose: defines critical information system software and other security-related information requiring backup copies to be stored in a fire-rated container that is not collocated with the operational system; an

parts.name: objective
parts.prose: stores backup copies of organization-defined critical information system software and other security-related information in a separate facility or in a fire-rated container that is not collocated with the operational system
